page.title: 01ST.MARGARET'S BAY.
page.content: {ST.MARGARET'S BAY }is a part of the village of {ST.MARGARET'S-AT-CLIFFE, which is about 4 miles from {DOVER.} There are about 2000 people in the village and most of them commute to nearby towns to work. It is divided into two parts-{THE {BAY}and {THE VILLAGE.}The village contains houses and shops while the Bay consists mainly of houses. We are quite lucky to have enough shops for us to manage to live well without having to go into Dover-baker, grocer,greengrocer,chemist,newsagent, butcher and a post office as well as 6 pubs! The name of the village come from the name given to the church-{ST. {MARGARET'S OF ANTIOCH }and its only claim to fame in the past has been when the bay was used as a landing beach for cross Channel swims.
